## Description {#details}

Iterator for the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a></code> edges of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user">User</a>&#39;s operands.

\\Returns the operand <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a></code> when dereferenced.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/user-h">User.h</a>.
